import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Calendar from'react-calendar';import'react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css';import axios from'axios';// For API requests

useEffect(()=>{const fetchEvents=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/itinerary');setEvents(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching events:',error);}};fetchEvents();},[]);const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setEventForm({...eventForm,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('/api/itinerary',eventForm);// Re-fetch events to update the calendar

return view==='month'&&events.map(event=>{const eventStartDate=new Date(event.startDate);const eventEndDate=new Date(event.endDate);if(date>=eventStartDate&&date<=eventEndDate){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:event.eventName},event.event_id);}return null;});}})})]});}export default Itinerary;
